Package apcs.fraction

Class Fraction

java.lang.Object
apcs.fraction.Fraction
public class Fraction extends Object
The fraction class can be used to add, subtract, multiply, divide and compare fractions without the loss of accuracy that comes with using the primitive double data type

    • compare

      public Boolean compare(String type, Fraction other)
      Compares 2 fractions to see if it is greater than or less than the other passed fraction
      Parameters:
      type - "greater" or "less" based on what the user wants to compare
      other - other fraction to be compared
      Returns:
      returns true if the fraction is greater than or less than based on what type the user passes through
